item.title: Deborah add a quote by Angela Davis
item.description: "A woman of color formation might decide to work around immigration issues. This political commitment is not based on the specific histories of racialized communities or its constituent members, but rather constructs an agenda agreed upon by all who are a part of it. In my opinion, the most exciting potential of women of color formations resides in the possibility of politicizing this identity â€“ basing the identity on politics rather than the politics on identity." -- Angela Davis
